message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $11,000 is below my bottom line.  Could you do $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,000. Can you consider my offer?
